O

onClickAddAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainWindowController
Changes the window to the add appointment window.
onClickConvertTime() - Method in class Controller.AddAppointmentWindowController
Button to convert the time entered by the user.
onClickConvertTime(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.ModifyAppointmentWindowController
Converts the times that were entered in the corresponding time controls, and displays them in the labels at the bottom of the page.
onClickDeleteAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainWindowController
Deletes the selected appointment from the database then refills the list of appointments and applies it to the appointment table.
onClickDeleteCustomer() - Method in class Controller.CustomerViewWindowController
Deletes the selected customer from the database and resets the table with the new list obtained after deletion.
onClickEditAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainWindowController
Captures the selected appointment, sends it to the modify appointment window, then changes the window to the modify appointment window.
onClickModifyCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.CustomerViewWindowController
Sets a static customer variable in the modify customer window to the selected customer.
onSelectFilterByMonth(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainWindowController
Creates a list of appointments that take place in the current month and sets the appointment TableView to display them.
onSelectFilterByWeek(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainWindowController
creates a list of appointments in the next week then sets a label to display this time range, hiding the default label.
onSelectNoFilter(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainWindowController
Sets the appointment TableView to show all appointments.
openConnection() - Static method in class DatabaseAccess.JDBC
Attempts to connect to the database.
